description.value:
Effect: Your choice of your Might or Agility increases by 1 (to a maximum of 6). Additionally, choose one of the following benefits:

  • Bounce Back Fast:

    Whenever you rest for 8 hours or more, you can gain the benefit of a respite. Once you use this benefit, you can’t use it again until you have taken a regular respite.

  • Reserves of Strength:

    Your recovery value is half your Stamina.

  • Undying:

    You can’t be affected by the bleeding condition.

nHhqZCkaHnMU9pG3.description: Your choice of your Might or Agility increases by 1 (to a maximum of 6).

system.story: To reach Giant’s Foot by dawn, we’ll have to run every step of the way. Let’s get moving.

prerequisites.value: You have the Unstoppable title, and you make or assist on a test as part of a montage test that obtains a full success.
